---
title: "Compound Interest Calculator"
filters: 
 - shinylive
---

This interactive tool allows you to calculate the future value of an investment with compound interest.

```{shinylive-r}
#| standalone: true

library(shiny)

ui <- fluidPage(
  h2("Compound Interest Calculator"),
  sidebarLayout(
    sidebarPanel(
      sliderInput("principal", "Principal Amount", 1000, 100000, 10000, step = 1000),
      sliderInput("rate", "Annual Interest Rate (%)", 0.1, 20.0, 5.0, step = 0.1),
      sliderInput("years", "Number of Years", 1, 50, 10, step = 1)
    ),
    mainPanel(
      h3("Future Value:"),
      textOutput("future_value")
    )
  )
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  output$future_value <- renderText({
    P <- input$principal
    r <- input$rate / 100
    n <- input$years
    A <- P * (1 + r)^n
    paste0("$", format(round(A, 2), big.mark = ","))
  })
}

shinyApp(ui, server)

```
